bibl.title: Banquets, Reputation and Social Obligation in Roman Egypt: Some Notes on the Dinner Invitations in Papyri.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Feasts and the quest for the status quo. - 3. Feasts, commensal hospitality, and social obligation. - 4. Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Alba de Frutos García, Banquets, Reputation and Social Obligation in Roman Egypt: Some Notes on the Dinner Invitations in Papyri.
1. Introduction. - 2. Feasts and the quest for the status quo. - 3. Feasts, commensal hospitality, and social obligation. - 4. Conclusions.
